title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Nature
body: Nature        Great Blue Heron can be seen across the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail. Photo Credit: NPS   Â      waterfall along the Great Allegheny Passage   The Trail network provides access to many unique ecosystems within five distinct geographic regions.
